resources.string:
G’day Dear Students! Welcome to Studying Mineral 101 :]
 The game designed for high school student who are trying to learn about minerals. 
 This mineral game contains 54 different minerals, and each Mineral has their own unique features and characteristics. 
 Through solving different mineral quizzes, let’s be familiar with Minerals! 
 Someday, maybe you could find diamonds or garnets near by you! 


You have 20 chances per game, do not miss your chances! 
 To choose the right mineral answer, please use your phone up-down-left and right, Move your phone direction all directions to get closer to your mineral answer. 
 Oh! Don’t forget to share your score with the others on high-score board and share twitter after you enjoy the game :] 
 

 Enjoy it! 
 Best Regards, 
 Team StudyingMineral101
